body_html:
Thanks for catching this! Looks like we're leaking a:

91a118c#diff-13b240d6141d88ca34aaf53be0178991R643

I think at the time we added the Magma bindings cuBLAS didn't provide a QR solver. I'm not sure there's any reason to prefer it now.
body_text:
Thanks for catching this! Looks like we're leaking a:
91a118c#diff-13b240d6141d88ca34aaf53be0178991R643
I think at the time we added the Magma bindings cuBLAS didn't provide a QR solver. I'm not sure there's any reason to prefer it now.
body:
Thanks for catching this! Looks like we're leaking `a`:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/91a118c116d15d280a99a39666d298be15c6d592#diff-13b240d6141d88ca34aaf53be0178991R643

I think at the time we added the Magma bindings cuBLAS didn't provide a QR solver. I'm not sure there's any reason to prefer it now.
